R

Radar - Class in edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.prog_assgnmntFINAL
Radar is a subclass of PowerUp, and its main intention is to reveal the document that hides behind one of the rooms in the world.
Radar() - Constructor for class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.prog_assgnmntFINAL.Radar
Constructs the Radar object into the grid.
reveal - Variable in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.prog_assgnmntFINAL.Engine
confirms the revealing of the objects in the grid, by means of displaying all of the symbols in the grid, including the document.
revealed() - Method in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.prog_assgnmntFINAL.PowerUp
reveals the symbol of the powerup to the player, if the player looks in to the direction of the power up.
revealed() - Method in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.prog_assgnmntFINAL.Room
Method reveals the symbol of the room, if the player looks upon it.
revealEnemy() - Method in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.prog_assgnmntFINAL.Enemy
reveals the enemy to the player, or world if in debug mode.
revealEnemy(int) - Method in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.prog_assgnmntFINAL.Engine
reveals the enemy if the player looks in that direction.
revealPowerup(int) - Method in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.prog_assgnmntFINAL.Engine
reveals the power up if the player spots it with the look method.
revealRoom(int) - Method in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.prog_assgnmntFINAL.Engine
reveals the room with the document, if the radar power up is activated.
rm - Variable in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.prog_assgnmntFINAL.Engine
randome decision maker for the enemies.
rm - Variable in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.prog_assgnmntFINAL.UserInterface
The random class is used as a helper for the aid in displaying random quotes after the player is brutally killed by an enemy.
